name: __Outliner
details:
This Power-Up turns your regular card comments into a living notebook.

- Edit comments with **visible formatting** (*WYSIWYG*)
- **Don't lose your changes** accidentally while editing
- Outliner: add **hierarchy** in your bullet-point lists, by pressing the `TAB` key (`â‡¥`).
- Be more **focused** while taking notes, by editing in a separate tab.

## Screenshot ![](https://github.com/adrienjoly/trello-outliner/raw/master/docs/markdown-editing.gif)
author: Adrien Joly
